data.title: BORIS GRINCHENKO’S WORKS AS A GENERATOR OF INNOVATIVE FORMS OF WORK WITH ART FACULTIES STUDENTS
data.meta_description: The article considers innovative forms of work (business game, syncvein and storytelling) with students of art specialties, introduced in order to deeply analyze the historical role of the personality and work of prominent Ukrainian writer, scientist and teacher Borys Grinchenko. The figurative and stylistic specifics of the artist’s poetry in the context of his epoch are characterized. The romantic essence of his work is determined, in which the features typical for the romantic worldview are organically …
data.text: Number of works in the list of references 10
